SELECT TAX_NO AS compRegNo , CMPNY_NM AS compName , IFNULL(CMPNY_CEO_NM,'') AS compCeo , IFNULL(CMPNY_ZIP,'') AS compZip , IFNULL(CMPNY_ADDR1,'')AS compAddr1 , IFNULL(CMPNY_ADDR2,'')AS compAddr2 , IFNULL(MANGER_EMAIL,'')AS mangerEmail , DEL_YN AS delYn FROM CMPNY_INFO WHERE DEL_YN = 'N'
AND CMPNY_NM LIKE CONCAT('%',UPPER(#{srch2}),'%')
AND TAX_NO LIKE CONCAT('%',UPPER(#{srch3}),'%')
AND 1=1
AND B.AGREE_YN = #{srch4}
AND A.MANUAL_YN = #{srch6]
ORDER BY CMPNY_NM
ORDER BY CMPNY_NM DESC
ORDER BY TAX_NO
ORDER BY TAX_NO DESC
ORDER BY CMPNY_NM
LIMIT #{recordCountPerPage} OFFSET #{startPage}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM CMPNY_INFO WHERE DEL_YN = 'N'
AND CMPNY_NM LIKE CONCAT('%',UPPER(#{srch2}),'%')
AND TAX_NO LIKE CONCAT('%',UPPER(#{srch3}),'%')

SELECT B.CMPNY_NM AS compName ,A.TAX_NO AS compRegNo ,A.BRANCH_CD AS branchCd ,IFNULL (A.CUS_PRG_CD,"")AS cusPrgCd ,A.DEL_YN AS delYn FROM CMPNY_BRANCH_INFO A LEFT JOIN CMPNY_INFO B ON A.TAX_NO = B.TAX_NO WHERE A.DEL_YN = 'N'
AND A.TAX_NO LIKE CONCAT('%',UPPER(#{srch5}),'%')
AND A.BRANCH_CD LIKE CONCAT('%',UPPER(#{srch6}),'%')
ORDER BY B.CMPNY_NM
ORDER BY B.CMPNY_NM DESC
ORDER BY A.TAX_NO
ORDER BY A.TAX_NO DESC
ORDER BY A.TAX_NO
LIMIT #{recordCountPerPage} OFFSET #{startPage}
